thread.section_title: Hallowood Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hallowood Furniture | www.hallowood.co.uk
thread.title: Mrs Jennifer Ward
thread.title_full: Hallowood Furniture reviewed by Mrs Jennifer Ward

author: Mrs Jennifer Ward
title: Mrs Jennifer Ward
text: I wanted a television corner unit that complimented my existing furniture and this fitted the bill perfectly. The position of the feet on my television were a problem and the diagrams with comprehensive measurements were invaluable. The gentleman who took my order on the phone was very helpful and the unit is good quality and exactly as shown online. The unit was well packaged and the delivery firm very easy to deal with.
